| Improve this Doc View Source

IsDoorCollision(UInt16)

Check to see if a sprite change should also trigger a collision change. Used to determine if a door opening triggers a collision update server side or not. This specifically handles the case of doors in Piet and Undine which are 3 tiles wide (and all 3 change graphically) but collision updates only occur for two tiles.

Declaration
public static bool IsDoorCollision(ushort sprite)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.UInt16 sprite

Sprite number.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

true/false indicating whether the sprite should trigger a collision.
| Improve this Doc View Source
